section.title: purchase orders releasing by agent Release Purchase Orders by Agent
section.para: To release purchase orders by agent, go to Purchase > Purchase Order > Release by Agent. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Release Purchase Orders by Purchasing Agent

section.para: When releasing purchase orders by agent, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to release purchase orders for all purchasing agents.
Specify purchasing agent whose purchase orders you want to release. Users may be designated as purchasing agents at the System level.
